data.title: 以至少 50 个字回答问题
data.content: "Some people are content with what they have, while others are never satisfied. Describe the advantages and disadvantages of these two attitudes."
data.answer: At some point or another, we all get caught in the future trap. "If I could just earn X, or achieve Y, I'll be happy. We all know that superficial things such as money, status, power give fleeting, temporary happiness. Yet, some people never get satisfied. There are advantages and disadvantages of people who are content with what they have and those who are never satisfied. To start with, people who are never satisfied will try to pursue more, and they never give up. However, they can become greedy and do whatever they can to get everything they want. For the other kind of people, they always cherish what they have. However, they may turn out to be lazy and do not want to fight for anything they want. （127 字）
